casebody.data:
STATE of North Carolina
v.
Jermaine Antwan TART No. 427PA17 Supreme Court of North Carolina. May 9, 2018 Ms. Sarah Holladay, Attorney at Law, Mr. Michael T. Henry, Assistant Attorney General, Mr. James R. O'Neill, District Attorney, for NC State.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the conditional petition filed on the 22nd of January 2018 by Defendant in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 9th of May 2018."

Therefore the case is docketed as of the date of this order's certification. Briefs of the respective parties shall be submitted to this Court within the times allowed and in the manner provided by Appellate Rule 15(g)(2).
